name: Snake (itch) (jimmyhadley)
description:
Feed the snake, my first HTML5 game using the canvas element.

Instructions:

This 2D game requires you to grow your snake by eating apples that randomly appear on the game board . Be carful not to crash into the walls or your own tail!

Controls:

Keyboard only using the WASD keys.

W = North

A = West

S = South

D = East

Genre: Puzzle

Mode: Single-player

Skills required: Strategy, quick reactions, observation
